name: drupal/ai_agents
description: Allows AI agents to be used on Drupal websites to do changes and lookup things.

suggest.drupal/unstructured: Makes the AI Form integrations work better by allowing many file contexts.
suggest.drupal/simple_crawler: Allows the AI Form integrations to crawl websites.
suggest.drupal/bpmn_io: Allows editing of AI agents with BPMN diagrams.
